item.title: 10-Bed-ICU initiative comes to K.R. Hospital
item.description: 10-Bed-ICU initiative comes to K.R. Hospital CM Basavaraj Bommai to inaugurate tomorrow along with a Tele-ICU Hub Mysuru: Chief Minister Basavaraj Bommai will launch a 10-Bed-ICU initiative where ICUs with 10 beds have been set up at K.
